text: My message is all about peace.
author: Puff Daddy

text: The practice of peace and reconciliation is one of the most vital and artistic of human actions.
author: Nhat Hanh

text: Once I accepted Christ I immediately had peace. I still didn't have a place to live, I still didn't have a car, but I had peace.
author: Sherri Shepherd

text: Let peace, descending from her native heaven, bid her olives spring amidst the joyful nations and plenty, in league with commerce, scatter blessings from her copious hand!
author: Daniel Boone
